title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content, the content type does not apply.
OB: The content displayed by the dynamic text element does not format the HTML tags properly. The HTML text within <html>...</html> tags is not rendered as expected. The HTML fragments not within <html> tags are not displayed at all. The text with RTF tags is also displayed without any formatting.
EB: The dynamic text element should format the HTML tags properly. The HTML text within <html>...</html> tags should be rendered correctly. The HTML fragments not within <html> tags should be displayed as-is. The text with RTF tags should be displayed with the appropriate formatting applied.
SR:
1. Create a database field with three types of content: 
	- HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
	- HTML fragments not within <html> tags
	- Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field on a webpage.
3. Verify that the HTML tags within <html>...</html> tags are rendered correctly.
4. Verify that the HTML fragments not within <html> tags are displayed as they are.
5. Verify that the text with RTF tags is displayed with the appropriate formatting applied.
